articles.title: European Super League: 'Big Six have taken a slapping' says Steve Bruce as Premier League managers react - Sky Sports
articles.description: Premier League managers have their say over the European Super League debacle as Newcastle United boss Steve Bruce says the 'Big Six' clubs "took a slapping".

articles.title: JPMorgan admits it misjudged backing European Super League - Reuters UK
articles.description: JPMorgan (JPM.N) said on Friday it regretted supporting soccer clubs in launching a breakaway European Super League after the plan collapsed earlier this week due to a storm of protest from fans and politicians.
